title: Fizik Terra Argo X1 brings lighter carbon rails to their plush gravel bike saddles
content:
Launched last year, the Fizik Terra Argo gravel saddles offered their wide, snub-nosed shape in a model specifically designed for hitting the groad less traveled. The original collection included two metal-railed options. Now, theyâ€™ve added a top-tier X1 model with carbon rails to drop weight and offer a slightly stiffer version. The overall shape remains

The post Fizik Terra Argo X1 brings lighter carbon rails to their plush gravel bike saddles appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
